Title: Powerless
Plot: While at an AA meeting Reese thinks she overheard someone admit to a rape.  She finds herself in danger because she won't back down and keeps on investigating. Crews goes on a stakeout with Lt. Davis and learns some surprising information about his former partner Bobby Stark.
GuestStars: Jeffrey Pierce, Deborah Ann Woll, Ben Benitez, Dale Dickey, Doug McKeon, Ken Faulcon, Rob Brownstein, Visa May, William Ngo
